data.actual_result: The server settings option does not pop up>
data.expected_result: The option Server Settings should pop up along with Notification Settings and Leave Server (if not owner)
data.short_description: Server settings option does not show up in server options.
data.steps_to_repro: - let somebody create a server / join a server - obtain manage nickname permissions - observe that you can't see server settings for ios, while still being able to see the server settings for android / desktop (member list)
